paragraphs.content: JST, Matthew 13:39–44. Compare Matthew 13:39–42; see also D&C 86:1–7
paragraphs.contentHtml: JST, Matthew 13:39–44. Compare Matthew 13:39–42; see also D&C 86:1–7

paragraphs.content: The harvest is the end of the world, or the destruction of the wicked.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The harvest is the end of the world, or the destruction of the wicked.

paragraphs.content: The reapers are the angels, or the messengers sent of heaven.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The reapers are the angels, or the messengers sent of heaven.

paragraphs.content: As, therefore, the tares are gathered and burned in the fire, so shall it be in the end of this world, or the destruction of the wicked.
paragraphs.contentHtml: As, therefore, the tares are gathered and burned in the fire, so shall it be in the end of this world, or the destruction of the wicked.

paragraphs.content: For in that day, before the Son of man shall come, he shall send forth his angels and messengers of heaven.
paragraphs.contentHtml: For in that day, before the Son of man shall come, he shall send forth his angels and messengers of heaven.

paragraphs.content: And they shall gather out of his kingdom all things that offend, and them which do iniquity, and shall cast them out among the wicked; and there shall be wailing and gnashing of teeth.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And they shall gather out of his kingdom all things that offend, and them which do iniquity, and shall cast them out among the wicked; and there shall be wailing and gnashing of teeth.

paragraphs.content: For the world shall be burned with fire.
paragraphs.contentHtml: For the world shall be burned with fire.
